api_list.name: get top 30 list of GitHub repos for your search
api_list.description: get top 30 list of GitHub repos for your search
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://github-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/search_top30/rails"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "github-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://github-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/search_top30/{query}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "github-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
